description.displayText: Nora has been an incredible sitter for our family, especially for our daughter, L. From the very beginning, she took the time to understand our family’s needs and was genuinely engaged in making sure L. felt comfortable and entertained. Nora is naturally creative and has a talent for planning activities that kept L. engaged and excited. Whether it was arts and crafts, imaginative play, or educational games, she always found new ways to make each visit fun and meaningful. She’s reliable, responsible, and always brings such positive energy. We’re so grateful to have her!
